mapper.select: SELECT mt.MT_CODE, mt.MT_NAME, mt.MATERIAL_TYPE, mt.SPECIFICATION, mt.UNIT, mt.UNIT_PRICE, mt.SAFETY_STOCK, mt.COMM, mt.STC_CODE, mt.UPDATE_DATE, mt.CURRENT_STC, mt.LEADTIME FROM MT mt

SELECT mt.MT_CODE, mt.MT_NAME, mt.MATERIAL_TYPE, mt.SPECIFICATION, mt.UNIT, mt.UNIT_PRICE, mt.SAFETY_STOCK, mt.COMM, mt.STC_CODE, mt.UPDATE_DATE, mt.CURRENT_STC, mt.LEADTIME FROM MT mt WHERE mt.MT_CODE = #{mtCode}

SELECT mt.MT_CODE, mt.MT_NAME, mt.MATERIAL_TYPE, mt.SPECIFICATION, mt.UNIT, mt.UNIT_PRICE, mt.SAFETY_STOCK, mt.COMM, mt.STC_CODE, mt.UPDATE_DATE, mt.CURRENT_STC, mt.LEADTIME FROM MT mt WHERE mt.MT_CODE IN
#{materialCode}

SELECT bd.MT_CODE, m.MT_NAME, SUM(pd.QUANTITY) AS QUANTITY, COALESCE(SUM(DISTINCT MT_IN.INQUANTITY), 0) AS CURRENT_STC, m.SAFETY_STOCK, SUM(bd.QUANTITY_REQUIRED * pd.QUANTITY) AS TOTAL_REQUIRED FROM PLAN p JOIN PLAN_DETAIL pd ON p.PLAN_CODE = pd.PLAN_CODE JOIN BOM b ON pd.PRD_CODE = b.PRD_CODE JOIN B_DETAIL bd ON b.BOM_CODE = bd.BOM_CODE JOIN MT m ON bd.MT_CODE = m.MT_CODE LEFT JOIN MT_IN ON MT_IN.MT_CODE = m.MT_CODE WHERE p.PLAN_CODE = #{planCode} GROUP BY bd.MT_CODE, m.MT_NAME, m.SAFETY_STOCK ORDER BY m.MT_NAME
